titleStmt.title: Sermons preached by Dr. Robert Leighton, late archbishop of Glasgow published at the desire of his friends, after his death, from his papers written with his own hand.
titleStmt.author: Leighton, Robert, 1611-1684.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for S.K. and are to be sold by Awnsham and John Churchill ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
